thread.title: Edward
thread.title_full: SwissLuxury.Com Rolex Watches reviewed by Edward

author: Edward
title: Edward
text: Extremely helpful with the entire process. I was able to call multiple times and really discuss the nature of the watch. When the watch arrive I was amazed that it was so new all of the protective plastic was attached. This was a very smooth personable process with an absolute amazing price. I will definitely purchase from Darryl again!
